text: Sano litaka (lyele lisikuli) lichiŵala ni lilanguka lya M’mbujegwe (Allah, ndema jatachiyika kukwiilanya magambo), ni chichiŵichidwa chitabu (chamasengo ga ŵandu), ni taachiyika nao Achimitume kwisa soni mboni, ni kuchijilanyisyidwa chilikati chao mwakuonaonape, soni ŵanganyao ngasatendedwa lupuso
